items.sentence: Tom quit his job and decided to travel around the world.
Tom started to answer the question, but was interrupted.
Tom was disappointed that he couldn\'t get into Harvard.
I think that was one of the best movies I\'ve ever seen.
Tom ate some of my rice while I was away from the table.
Tom broke one of the rules and was kicked out of school.
Tom broke up with Mary and started going out with Alice.
Tom burned all the pictures he had of his ex-girlfriend.
I started studying French when I was in the third grade.
I don\'t know why Tom didn\'t do what I asked him to do.
